commit.message: teach rustc about remove_stable_features and removed no-stack-chech feature. fixes #34915

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@

+#![deny(warnings)]
+#![feature(no_stack_check)]
+//~^ ERROR: 12:12: 12:26: feature has been removed [E0557]
+fn main() {
+
+}
